favourite.article: Oh Lord, rekindle my love for You!

You need the Nazarites to turn this age. Strengthen us to overcome in these last daysâ€” All rebellion, natural affection, even death, Worldly pleasures, every enjoyment of the flesh. I need You, but You NEED ME TOO, To do what You want to do.. Praise the Lord!

Sanctify me absolutely, take my life and have Your way. Overcome in me, give me victory through Your life and end this age. I need You, but You need me (more) too, to do what You want me to do. Rekindle all of my love for You, to be a voluntarily consecrated one. ... Thank You Lord Jesus! I love You Lord! Amen.
I need You, but You need ME too!! Sanctify me absolutely Lord! Take my life and have YOUR way.
Move in me to turn my heart and consecrate.
I rekindle all of my love for You, to be a voluntarily consecrated one!
